channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for NC

item.title: Report X-2024100922
item.description:
Report X-2024100922

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-17T09:14:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-07
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER ARRIVED TO DOOR 30 WEARING PROPER PPE. PACKAGE WAS LEAKING INSIDE THE TRAILER. RESPONDER USED DECISION TREE AND FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEETS TO CLEAN UP THE SPILL. PACKAGE WAS TRANSPORTED TO DMP AREA FOR FURTHER PROCESSING.

item.title: Report X-2024100858
item.description:
Report X-2024100858

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-16T09:16:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-09
  • City: GREENSBORO
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: INSPECTION WAS DONE ON ONE AIR PACKAGE THAT FELT COLD TO THE TOUCH AND WAS MARKED PERISHABLE. PACKAGE CONTENT INSPECTION REVEALS APPROXIMATELY TEN POUNDS OF DRY ICE PELLETS COOLING FOOD. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. THE PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM NORTH CAROLINA USING UPS ACCOUNT A75Y17, VNDR, 2323 BROADWAY SUITE 207, OAKLAND CA 94612. THIS PACKAGE HAS NOT BEEN ACCEPTED FOR AIR OR TRANSPORTED IN THE AIR BY UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.

item.title: Report X-2024100669
item.description:
Report X-2024100669

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-12T21:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-01
  • City: SHELBY
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: THE BOX WAS DISCOVERED DURING THE UNLOAD PHASE TO BE LEAKING. IT WAS PLACED IN A SPILL TRAY IN THE DMP AREA. AFTER REFERENCING THE DECISION TREE AND APPROPRIATE RESPONSE SHEET, RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL ACCORDING TO THE FLAMMABLE LIQUID RESPONSE SHEET. AFTER SPILL WAS ABSORBED, RESPONDER DECONTAMINATED THE AREA.
